CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL(Last_Price_Refresh__c),'', TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(Last_Price_Refresh__c))) & "/" & TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(Last_Price_Refresh__c))) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Last_Price_Refresh__c))) & " " & IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Last_Price_Refresh__c), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( Last_Price_Refresh__c), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Last_Price_Refresh__c), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Last_Price_Refresh__c), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( Last_Price_Refresh__c), 15, 2 ) & " " & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Last_Price_Refresh__c), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" ))
CustomField.label: Last Price Refresh
